tasks.task: So, a high-level MAINTASK would be "Farm Fleckbee cattle with an emphasis on maintaining heritage," with several subtasks like grazing management, nutrition, selective breeding, and record keeping. But all of these are inferences and not explicitly stated in the transcript.
